Articles.Content:
I was installing Webroot and it found the virus W32.InfoStealer.zeus in Patcher.exe! In kerbal space program folder!

REMOVE PATCHER NOW!!! It is a virus!

The Patcher is a program that downloads files from the internet and uses that to update files on your computer. This process makes it seem suspicious to an antivirus program and some of those may give off warnings, these warnings are false. The patcher is not a malicious tool.

Thread closed.
